Ok St.Ack; I am really sorry, I had not seen the hcc.properties section.

I=
 could run a controller instance, only to see that its functionality
can be=
 accesed by JMX with jconsole, because I did not yet install a
JNDI server.=
 I think that, to people that is not got used to work with
JMX (as me), it =
would be important to add that the example code in
http://crawler.archive.o=
rg/hcc/apidocs/overview-summary.html should be
executed with the option -Dc=
om.sun.management.jmxremote. 

And finally, a question: can JBOSS's jndi se=
rvice be downloaded and
installed on its own, and not with the application =
server?

Thanks very much,

tizo
